# parseCST() function

Parse input into a MessageResource CST. Should never throw an Error.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare function parseCST(source: string, onError: (range: CST.Range, msg: string) => void): CST.Resource;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  source | string | The full source being parsed |
|  onError | (range: [CST.Range](./resource.cst.range.md)<!-- -->, msg: string) =&gt; void | Error handler, may be called multiple times for bad input. |

**Returns:**

[CST.Resource](./resource.cst.resource.md)
